name: Semi-AutoCHROMAtic
description:
Controls: WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Left Click - Primary weapon
Right Click - Secondary (collected) weapon

In this game, your weapon shoots colour-coded bullets. The bullets insta-kill enemies of a matching colour. Your magazine is a die with different sides. When you reload, it randomly selects what colours end up in your clip.

You can see the colour of your next few shots, so plan ahead accordingly.

WEAPONS You start with a D6 with even distribution of colours. This die will never break. You can find and dual wield other dice with different colour distribution. You can see all of the die's sides to the left or right of the HUD.

The other dice will break once all of their uses were expended.
